Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.xpath

This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XPath This implementation uses the Jaxen library in order to run expressions written in the XPath language.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeAbstractXPathExpressionRunner A base class for implementations of xpath expression runners.
AeBPWSXPathExpressionRunner Implements an XPath 1.0 expression runner.
AeWSBPELXPathExpressionRunner Implements an XPath 1.0 expression runner.
AeWSBPELXPathLinkVariableContext An implementation of a Jaxen variable context.
AeWSBPELXPathVariableContext An implementation of a Jaxen variable context.
AeXPathContext Provides a runtime evaluation context for calling expression functions.
AeXPathExpressionTypeConverter An implementation of a type converter for jaxen.
AeXPathFunction Implements an xpath function given the generic ActiveBPEL IAeExpressionFunction.
AeXPathFunctionContext This class implements a jaxen function context from an ActiveBPEL function context.
AeXPathNamespaceContext Implements a namespace context that can be used during XPath expression execution.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.xpath Description

This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XPath This implementation uses the Jaxen library in order to run expressions written in the XPath language.
